SELECT JYLX, JYSJ, SHMC, JYE FROM "USR_ZSJ"."CARDFLOW" WHERE to_char( to_date( CJSJ, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss' ), 'yyyy-mm' ) = to_char( SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm' ) AND XGH=#{xgh} order by cjsj desc

SELECT JYLX, JYSJ, SHMC, JYE FROM "USR_ZSJ"."CARDFLOW" WHERE TO_DATE(CJSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') >=TO_DATE( '${mintime} 00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss' ) AND TO_DATE(CJSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') <=TO_DATE( '${maxtime} 23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss' ) and xgh=#{xgh} ORDER BY CJSJ desc
